som1 has pmed me the correct code and for any1 esle that was wondering it is:

} if(starter == 0){ starter = 1; showInterface(3559); apset = true; addItem(1323, 1); addItem(3842, 1); addItem(841, 1); addItem(882, 100000); addItem(392, 100000); addItem(995, 5000000); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); q1 = 15; }

item.title: Quest fin ished on start help plz
item.dc:creator: @sunnydays sunnydays
item.description:
@sunnydays wrote:

how can i make it so that when they log in the quests are already done.

} if(starter == 0){ starter = 1; showInterface(3559); apset = true; addItem(1323, 1); addItem(3842, 1); addItem(841, 1); addItem(882, 100000); addItem(392, 100000); addItem(995, 5000000); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); }

thats my current starter wut can i add to that so that quests are already done?
i thought that: setquest(q1, 15); would work
